page.title: 17Traffic Census in Asfordby
page.content: Results of a traffic census undertaken in{ASFORDBY}on{Thursday September 19th {1985.}Two census points were used ---- {LOUGHBOROUGH ROAD (at the point where {the Morris Camm Walk path reaches the {side of Loughborough Road).----------- {SAXELBY ROAD (at the point where {Captains Close School's vehicle {entrance meets Saxelby Road). } The traffic census was undertaken at these two points simultaneously. The time of census was{10.00a.m.}to{ {10.20a.m.}- 20minutes in total.Traffic moving in both directions was counted. {LOUGHBOROUGH ROAD RESULTS}_ CARS_{84} VANS_{16}LORRIES_{21}TRACTORS_{2}FIRE ENGINES_{0}AMBULANCES_{0}BICYCLES_{0} DUMPER TRUCKS_{0}MOTORBIKES_{0}MILK FLOATS_{0}DUSTCART(REFUSE DISPOSAL VEHICLE)_{0}HORSES_{0}DIGGER(JCB)_ {0} COMBINE HARVESTER_ {0. {SAXELBY ROAD RESULTS ARE ON PAGE 18.}
